author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Riber Receives Major Repeat Order For Accessories In Asia
text:
Jan 10 (Reuters) - Riber Sa:
* REG-RIBER RECEIVES A MAJOR REPEAT ORDER FOR ACCESSORIES IN ASIA
* ‍MAJOR ORDER FOR MORE THAN TWO MILLION EUROS FROM A CUSTOMER IN ASIA​
* ‍ORDER FOR SUPPLY OF ACCESSORIES IN SCREEN INDUSTRY​ * ‍ACCESSORIES ORDER TO BE DELIVERABLE IN 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
